title: The Cowboy's Secret Past
description: He’s not the same man he was But maybe now he’s ready to be a father Since leaving his wild rodeo days behind, rancher Trevor Morgan has sobered up and built a faith-filled life. So he’s shocked when the woman caring for his grandfather intrudes on that solitude. Nurse Hope Burke has hidden motives for coming to the Lazy M Ranch—she believes Trevor is the father of her orphaned nephew. Can a loving aunt and a wary cowboy change a little boy’s life forever? From Love Uplifting stories of faith, forgiveness and hope.Lazy M Ranch Book 1: The Baby InheritanceBook 2: The Cowboy BargainBook 3: The Cowboy's Secret Past
author: Tina Radcliffe
